participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Friendly and down-to-earth, enjoys simple pleasures and has a love for classic rock music.
participant_1.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite band is the who. i have never been out of ohio. my favorite food is pizza with black olives.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Reflective and resilient, with a strong connection to his past and a commitment to personal growth.
participant_2.background: i am a recovering alcoholic. i'm a 45 year old male. i now live in the city. i grew up on a farm.

content.text: hello john, what are you up to today? i just finished working at the store.
